reviews.text: It's decent. I would say for the same price, 7th Street Burger and Harlem Shake is better but still a fine place to go. I got the fried chicken and it didn't have much flavor - you can see the chicken is still pale yellow (comparatively to seasoned fried chicken/fried long enough chicken). Although looking at the burger again, the patties seem larger than the ones at either of the first two places I mentioned if you're looking for quantity.
Real taste

I highly recommend Smash and Grill! Their chicken over rice comes in a very generous portion, and it even includes fries on the side. The salad is super fresh and refreshing. The staff are friendly and welcoming, which makes the whole experience even better. Definitely a spot I‚Äôll be coming back to!

- Updates -

I‚Äôve been a regular customer ( placed at least 20+ orders since they open), but I‚Äôm honestly disappointed with my recent order. The price stayed the same, but the portion size has clearly decreased ‚Äî at least 30% less compared to what I usually receive. I really should‚Äôve taken a photo to show the difference because if you compare it with other customers‚Äô past review photos, you can clearly see the change.

If this continues, I won‚Äôt be returning. At this point, even the halal food cart on 50th Street in Manhattan offers better consistency and value.
Amazing food and great service! Everything was delicious and the staff were super friendly. Definitely one of my favorite spots in Brooklyn highly recommend!

Diablo burger is always a good to for me
Service is always quick and efficient for
Best Falafel in Brooklyn. I‚Äôve tried dozens of places and nothing is quite as perfect as this. Chicken fingers are also insanely good. 5/5
So tasty

Decided to be adventurous and try something new. Decent fish and shrimp but the pics are misleading on Uber Eats. We thought we were getting a good deal by purchasing the BOGO fresh fish plate and shrimp plate. The pics showed fries included but apparently the fries are sold separately. $28 later we‚Äôre still hungry.
Ordered food from here for the first time and wasn‚Äôt disappointed. Let‚Äôs keep this business growing. Do it for Brooklyn. They‚Äôre amazing!
Now yall? I love the lemon pepper wings and the entrees are worth every penny food made fresh and always on point

My only issue is that bro, you have to tell ppl you put cheese on your burger it‚Äôs not listed in the ingredients. I don‚Äôt do cheese. Not everyone wants that shit. I been a bunch usually get the wings but yeah cheese is an ingredient should not be assumed

The cashier with long beard and cape  was very rude . Didn‚Äôt want to explain the order and very ignorant! He should get fired ! I really wanted to buy some hamburger and he gave me some nasty attitude like I went there buy free stuff ! Please take action he is ruining whole business. The
Excelent delivrie cervices
Love this place. Nice people who work there. Good food.
Best Delivery Service in Brooklyn ‚ù§Ô∏è
Exlente restaurante Dios los bendiga
Always pleasurable place to get a quick good meal.
The best wings on this side of the Mississippi
Wonderful customer service!! Han gives the ultimate most, knows his customer base very well! Food is phenomenal,  my girl can't stop moaning!! Must hit!!
Their service very good appreciated
Best service ever!!!!!
Buena comida
Smash burger are prefect and chicken and fish over rice always try chicken tenders over rice very delicious
Workers are so nice & portions are really generous. Love this place.
I love the food and the workers
Always a great vibe. Good food for great prices, it's a late night staple for us. Abdul and the rest of the team are super nice and want to get you exactly what you're looking for. Def recommend!

I am highly pissed off.
I got 2 smash burgers, with onion and smash sauce. No lettuce, pickles or tomatoes.
What is received was what is supposed to be a burger falling apart because that's how thin it was, 1 slice of tomato, a whole bunch of lettuce,no onions , a dab of smash sauce.
That was $10.00 completely wasted. It went in the garbage
Great food, even my picky husband loves it!
Ice cream was good

Okay, this place is a total neighborhood gem. The smash burger is AMAZING, it tastes like a Big Mac, but way better. Juicy, flavorful, crispy edges. The combo is a pretty solid deal, in my opinion. I‚Äôd recommend going for the double patty, trust me, you won‚Äôt regret it.
Adore this place, food is great and the people there are always friendly. Diablo burger is my go to these past few months and that and anything else I pick up there has been consistently great.

This is the perfect neighborhood burger joint! The food is a solid cut-and-a-half above fast food‚Äîin the same league as Shake Shack‚Äîand the staff are incredibly friendly. I end up eating hear once a week. My go-to is the double Americana with extra pickles. Highly recommend!
Great food great food everything!!‚Äô

The food was great. From the customer service to the chicken sandwich to the dessert oreo Belgian waffle, I would absolutely come back here again! I‚Äôm definitely going to try some new foods they have here but I think I might have found my favorite chicken sandwich spot. 10/10 would recommend. Definitely hitting this place up the next time im in Brooklyn!
Great food and friendly staff! Definitely a new favorite spot when I‚Äôm in the mood for a veggie burger
Great experience very tasteful and fast service
The burgers are great excellent customer service Abdul and Z are the best
First time trying it out. Ordered Lamb over rice, and a Diablo smashburger. They gave me a little extra since I had to wait it bit. Great portions and perfect drunk food
Best burger in the neighborhood!!!  üôá‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
Such a dope addition to the neighborhood! Great halal food and super friendly staff. Prices are reasonable too. Def recommend it!!

I was looking for a good halal-gyro plates in my neighborhood and this is the spot. Abdul and his crew hook you up with whatever you want, however you like it. The gyro plates, smash burgers, wings, and salads are delicious. I love the seasoned fries, and they got good deals to not break your bank.
I dont go anywhere else. Super nice guys and the best fried fish in the whole area, maybe even period. They got everything man, even waffles. Just go already
I came here once and tried the wings and been buying it ever since . Their hot lemon pepper wings , the fries , and tenders are amazing !! And so is there deserts etc. my new favorite place ü•π‚Ä¶
El cocinero, muy simp√°tico y la comida muy buena
Amazing burgers. Get the lamb over rice and ask for smash sauce!
They make the best milkshakes in bk. 10/10.
The food is great lamb salad was amazing
excellent food, excellent service, I recommend the lamb plate
Love the chopped cheese and mozzarella sticks. also their white sauce is bomb. They are quick and friendly!
Best burgers in the neighborhood! Go right now!
Fire spicy smash burger! El diablo wins the night ü´°üôè that sauce on the side is fiiiire well played smash n grill. You won a customer! Yes its better than 7th street

This is our second time at Smash n Grill. I got lamb over rice with salad one the side. My partner got the mix combo (chicken and lamb) over rice w/ salad. My mom ordered the traditional 6 pc BBQ wings.  I appreciate that they did not mince the lamb (cuts were nice and juicy) so that was a plus. Their portions are full of love and well as the food lol. My partner and mom enjoyed their meal also. For dessert we got the strawberry cheesecake, strawberry cheesecake ice cream, carrot cake and a black and white milkshake. The cheesecake ice cream was everything I needed. Definitely going back to try something new. Nasir at the counter has top tier customer service!
Everything about this place is spectacular! The staff is amazing. The food is great. The kitchen and waiting area is so clean! There‚Äôs not one thing about smash grill!
My favorite has to be the shrimp an fish combo but for today I going with the 10 piece shrimp an it never fails always fresh mush have it with the smash sauce

A new delicious spot close to home!

I hate to compare to The Munchies, but that's the reason I stopped by. The interior is very similar - bright lights, no seating, simple menu. Smash-n-Grill is a bit bigger inside and has more room for guests to wait.

The menu is easy to read. But I think where this place is different is the smash burger and the ice cream offerings. I didn't try either of them because I wanted to compare the fried chicken sandwich to The Munchies. Similar in price, we got the fried chicken hero combo. It took a while to get the order, but it is expected at a new establishment. It also didn't matter because it was delicious. The chicken was juicy and seasoned well. The amount of fries are the same, but I found these to stay crunchier than The Munchies.

This place is closer to me (not by much) so I'll be trying more when I'm feeling like eating some fresh, yummy food.

The customer service was also great! Welcome to the neighborhood Smash-N-Grill!

CASH DISCOUNT TOO!
Clean space, excellent manager doing expo, had unique interactions with every customer, food is high quality street truck food items. Fried fish was excellent. Keep up the good work
New spot, good food, quick service, good spot. Fries were crispy, burger was big and juciy. 10/10.

Great customer service, burgers are amazing ü§©
There fish is üî• next time got to try the shrimps
Great customer service! Perfect food portions and taste! Hats off to the handsome chef and front line worker!! lol üòâ

Great staff definitely help me decide on the chicken sandwich being that there wasn't a turkey burger option. Service was awesome and establishment clean. Hospitality was on a üíØ  well appreciated staff. Such a pleasant smile that wasn't on the menu.
I ordered the fish salad from Ace. He was so nice. Naz cooked the delicious fish. Hafiz was also cooking. They were all so nice! I'll be back and ordering online!!! Fresh food, seasoned right!

Love this new spot!! üî•üî•üî• Drove out from Long Island with my siblings and we all loved it. We brought some home for the fam and it was just as good as it was when we had it fresh
The smash burgers are a must have, and their sweet chili wings were a big hit in my house!!
Customer service was amazing, I felt both welcomed and appreciated. Best halal spot in bk!

Delicious food! My go to is the grilled chicken salad with white and green sauce. Healthy and nutritious choice, hefty portion, and priced fairly. I also tried the cheesesteak, it was fire!

Great Food
Great Staff
Great Prices

Must Try

If you're craving a great burger, this is the place to go! The Americana burger was incredibly tasty and the portions were impressive. Their fries also had a nice crunch. The staff were very friendly and nice!

I recently dined here and it was nothing short of amazing! The crispy chicken gyro and smash burger was absolutely divine ‚Äì perfectly seasoned and cooked to perfection. By far the best halal spot in Brooklyn! Me and the kids fought over who had the last piece of wings.
Swung by right before they closed last night‚Äîeverything was made fresh and tasted awesome. Super friendly service too. I‚Äôll definitely be back!

Where do I start!! The food is easily the best i‚Äôve had in the area and i can never get enough. My personal favorite is the smash burger , packed with flavor and a bang for your buck, you can‚Äôt go wrong ! Their staff is always good energy, great vibes and always have great service. If you‚Äôre ever in the area, stop by and yell out ZABAYYYY when you‚Äôre in there for good vibes and laughs.

I usually don't write reviews but there is something special about this spot! Not only is the staff extremely friendly but the food is on a different level. They have so many options and can fulfill any type of craving. You MUST try their grill chicken wraps mixed with falafel and hummus OR their cheeseburgers OR their lemon pepper wings...Now I'm hungry again thinking about their food!!

The smash burger is insane, easily the best smash burger I‚Äôve ever had and I had a lot throughout nyc. Wings along with the golden bird chicken sandwich were really good and the fruity pebbles milk shake is to die for. 10/10 def recommend
Best Halal food in Brooklyn, customer service is amazing! And food is Top quality üíØ
The food here is great - flavorful and well-cooked. Everything I've tried is delicious and really hits the spot. And the staff are always  so friendly. Love this spot!

There‚Äôs not enough words in the dictionary to describe how good the food is !!!! The Diablo smash burger is soo unique, I can‚Äôt get enough of it. The vibes and service is top tier. Easily the best halal spot in Brooklyn

SUPER chill. Quick and courteous. Their smashburger is LEGIT.

This is a sister shop to The Munchies south of E. Parkway, so you might recognize some peeps behind the counter. Simply the best.
